entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level lowering to 1200 metres near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1200 metres rising to 1700 metres in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers in the evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Snow level 1700 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
